leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 核科学与核聚变计算生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: 等离子体场, 粒子分布, 磁约束几何, 诊断信号, 输运方程
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→仿真→诊断/反演→控制/优化→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 大型仿真器 + 诊断/反演工具 + 控制/优化 + HPC

unit.unit_name: 装置几何、网格与磁约束建模工具链
unit.coverage_tools: geometry/CAD、磁场/线圈建模、网格生成与适配

queries: [WEB] fusion reactor cad to mesh github
[WEB] plasma physics magnetic field line tracing github

tools.name: tokamesh
tools.one_line_profile: Mesh generation and geometry matrix construction tool for tokamak tomography
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to construct meshes and geometry matrices specifically for tomography problems in tokamak fusion devices, facilitating plasma diagnostic analysis.

tools.name: freegs4e
tools.one_line_profile: Free boundary Grad-Shafranov solver for time evolution
tools.detailed_description: A solver for the Grad-Shafranov equation focusing on free boundary conditions and time evolution, used for modeling plasma equilibrium in fusion devices.

tools.name: FreeGSNKE
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutive free-boundary tokamak plasma equilibrium simulation code
tools.detailed_description: A Python code for simulating evolutive free-boundary tokamak plasma equilibrium, building upon the FreeGS framework.

tools.name: TextDescriptives
tools.one_line_profile: Library for calculating linguistic metrics from text
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating a large variety of metrics from text, including descriptive statistics, readability, and dependency distance, used in computational linguistics and social science research.

tools.name: EFIT.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia interface for reading EFIT geqdsk files
tools.detailed_description: Provides routines to read and handle EFIT geqdsk files, which are standard formats for storing magnetic equilibrium data in fusion research.

tools.name: Equilibrium.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia routines for MHD Equilibrium analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing routines for working with Magnetohydrodynamic (MHD) equilibrium, essential for plasma physics and fusion reactor modeling.

tools.name: Describe Anything
tools.one_line_profile: Detailed localized image and video captioning model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Describe Anything', a model for generating detailed localized captions for images and videos, serving as a foundational tool for visual data analysis and annotation.

tools.name: Open FUSION Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling tools suite for plasma and fusion research
tools.detailed_description: A suite of modeling tools and underlying finite element framework for solving problems in plasma and fusion research and engineering in arbitrary 2D and 3D geometries.

tools.name: DESC
tools.one_line_profile: Stellarator Equilibrium and Optimization Suite
tools.detailed_description: A code suite for solving and optimizing 3D MHD equilibrium in stellarators and other magnetic confinement devices using a pseudo-spectral method.

tools.name: Stellarator-Database-Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for uploading results to the stellarator database
tools.detailed_description: Functions and utilities required to upload DESC or VMEC equilibrium results to the community stellarator database, facilitating data sharing and analysis.

tools.name: FOCUS
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible Optimized Coils Using Space curves
tools.detailed_description: A code for designing optimized magnetic coils for stellarators and tokamaks using space curves representation, critical for magnetic confinement geometry.

tools.name: SPEC
tools.one_line_profile: Stepped-Pressure Equilibrium Code for MRxMHD
tools.detailed_description: An advanced Multi-Region Relaxed MHD (MRxMHD) equilibrium solver capable of handling stepped-pressure profiles, used for stellarator and tokamak physics.

tools.name: STELLOPT
tools.one_line_profile: Stellarator optimization code
tools.detailed_description: The state-of-the-art code for stellarator optimization, used to design magnetic configurations that meet specific physics and engineering criteria.

tools.name: PyGS
tools.one_line_profile: Magnetic flux rope detection and reconstruction tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for magnetic flux rope detection and reconstruction based on the extended Grad-Shafranov equation, used in space and plasma physics.

tools.name: ThinWire_MRIGradientCoilDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Gradient coil design tool for MRI
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for designing gradient coils for Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI), utilizing thin-wire approximations for electromagnetic design.

tools.name: eqdsk2helena
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for EQDSK equilibrium files to HELENA format
tools.detailed_description: A utility to convert magnetic equilibrium data from the standard EQDSK format into the input format required by the HELENA stability code.

tools.name: descriptastorus
tools.one_line_profile: Chemistry descriptor computation and storage library
tools.detailed_description: A library for computing chemical descriptors and optionally storing them, designed for machine learning applications in chemistry and cheminformatics.

tools.name: cfsem-py
tools.one_line_profile: Quasi-steady electromagnetics solver for fusion magnets
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for quasi-steady electromagnetics modeling, including filamentized approximations, Biot-Savart law calculations, and Grad-Shafranov equilibrium solving, developed by CFS.

tools.name: cfsem-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for quasi-steady electromagnetics and equilibrium solving in fusion
tools.detailed_description: A library providing tools for quasi-steady electromagnetics, including filamentized approximations, Biot-Savart law calculations, and Grad-Shafranov equilibrium solving, developed by Commonwealth Fusion Systems.

tools.name: interplanetary-grad-shafranov
tools.one_line_profile: Grad-Shafranov reconstruction tool for interplanetary magnetic flux ropes
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolkit for performing Grad-Shafranov reconstruction on interplanetary magnetic flux ropes, useful for analyzing magnetic field structures in space plasma physics.

tools.name: data-describe
tools.one_line_profile: Pythonic accelerator for exploratory data analysis (EDA)
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to accelerate Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) for data science, providing tools for data summarization, visualization, and quality assessment.

tools.name: Stein-Variational-Gradient-Descent
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Stein Variational Gradient Descent (SVGD) for Bayesian inference
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for the paper 'Stein Variational Gradient Descent (SVGD): A General Purpose Bayesian Inference Algorithm', providing a method for variational inference in probabilistic models.

tools.name: LANLGeoMag
tools.one_line_profile: Library for magnetic field models and coordinate transformations in geophysics
tools.detailed_description: A C-based library from Los Alamos National Laboratory providing magnetic field models, coordinate conversions, and tools for magnetic field line tracing and drift shell tracing in geophysical research.

tools.name: room_transfer_function_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for room transfer function representation and sound source localization
tools.detailed_description: A library for sparse representation of room transfer functions and algorithms for localizing sound sources in a room using a single microphone.

tools.name: grounded-video-description
tools.one_line_profile: Video grounding and captioning model
tools.detailed_description: A research tool for video grounding and captioning, enabling the association of textual descriptions with specific temporal segments in videos.

tools.name: freegs
tools.one_line_profile: Free boundary Grad-Shafranov solver for plasma equilibrium
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based free boundary Grad-Shafranov solver designed to calculate the equilibrium of plasma in magnetic confinement devices like tokamaks.

tools.name: cad_to_dagmc
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to convert CAD geometry to DAGMC h5m format
tools.detailed_description: A tool that converts CAD geometry (STP files) or Cadquery assemblies into DAGMC-compatible h5m files for use in neutronics and fusion simulations.

tools.name: cad_to_h5m
tools.one_line_profile: CAD to h5m converter using Cubit Python API
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that converts CAD files (STP, SAT) to h5m files compatible with DAGMC-based simulations, utilizing the Cubit Python API for geometry processing.

tools.name: paramak
tools.one_line_profile: Parametric 3D fusion reactor CAD and neutronics model generator
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for creating parametric 3D CAD models of fusion reactors and automatically generating neutronics models for simulation.

tools.name: omas
tools.one_line_profile: Ordered Multidimensional Array Structure for fusion data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an interface for the ITER Integrated Modeling & Analysis Suite (IMAS) data structure, facilitating data exchange and storage in fusion research.

tools.name: CoFF
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-Modal Feature Fusion for point cloud registration
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of 'Cross-Modal Feature Fusion for Robust Point Cloud Registration with Ambiguous Geometry', a method for aligning 3D point cloud data.

tools.name: gvec
tools.one_line_profile: Galerkin Variational Equilibrium Code for 3D MHD
tools.detailed_description: A flexible 3D ideal MHD equilibrium solver using a Galerkin variational approach, designed for generating three-dimensional magnetohydrodynamic equilibria.

tools.name: simsopt
tools.one_line_profile: Simons Stellarator Optimizer for magnetic configuration optimization
tools.detailed_description: A framework for optimizing stellarator magnetic configurations and other plasma physics problems, developed by the Hidden Symmetries project.

tools.name: efficient-descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: Binary local image descriptors for resource-limited devices
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of efficient binary local image descriptors designed for computer vision applications on resource-constrained devices.

tools.name: DiffVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for modelling cell differentiation
tools.detailed_description: Code for the paper 'Unsupervised generative and graph neural methods for modelling cell differentiation', providing a VAE-based approach to model biological processes.

tools.name: vae_mhd_solver
tools.one_line_profile: VAE-based neural network for ideal MHD equilibrium solving
tools.detailed_description: A Variational Autoencoder (VAE)-like neural network designed to solve the ideal MHD equilibrium problem in tokamak geometries.

tools.name: LFASR-FS-GAF
tools.one_line_profile: Deep coarse-to-fine dense light field reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a deep learning approach for dense light field reconstruction with flexible sampling and geometry-aware fusion.

tools.name: gradient-descent-the-ultimate-optimizer
tools.one_line_profile: Code for 'Gradient Descent: The Ultimate Optimizer' paper
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the optimization algorithms and experiments described in the NeurIPS 2022 paper 'Gradient Descent: The Ultimate Optimizer'.

tools.name: matlabVMEC
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for VMEC equilibrium code
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing MATLAB routines and wrappers for interacting with the VMEC (Variational Moments Equilibrium Code) MHD equilibrium solver.

tools.name: HELENA_Channel_Estimation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based channel estimation tool
tools.detailed_description: Code for the paper 'HELENA: High-Efficiency Learning-Based Channel Estimation Using Neural Attention', providing tools for channel estimation in telecommunications.

tools.name: SimNDT
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrasonic NDT Simulator based on EFIT
tools.detailed_description: An ultrasonic Nondestructive Testing (NDT) simulator using the Elastodynamic Finite Integration Technique (EFIT) for wave propagation simulation.

tools.name: vmecpp
tools.one_line_profile: Reimplementation of the VMEC equilibrium code for stellarator fusion devices
tools.detailed_description: A C++ and Python reimplementation of the Variational Moments Equilibrium Code (VMEC), a standard tool for computing 3D MHD equilibrium in stellarators and tokamaks. It offers improved performance and modern interfaces compared to the legacy Fortran version.

tools.name: SpacePy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for space science data analysis, modeling, and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for space science applications, providing tools for magnetic field modeling, drift shell tracing, time coordinate conversions, and data analysis for space plasma physics.

tools.name: GSFit
tools.one_line_profile: Grad-Shafranov equilibrium fitting code for tokamak plasma reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based implementation of the Grad-Shafranov equilibrium fitting algorithm, used for reconstructing plasma shapes and profiles in tokamak fusion devices from diagnostic data.

tools.name: Paramak
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating parametric 3D CAD models of fusion reactors
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating parametric 3D CAD models of fusion reactors. It automates the creation of complex geometries for neutronics, thermal, and mechanical analysis.

tools.name: ESSOS
tools.one_line_profile: e-Stellarator Simulation and Optimization Suite for fusion device design
tools.detailed_description: A suite for the simulation and optimization of stellarator fusion devices, focusing on equilibrium configurations and coil design optimization.
